ygData.subject: OOC:NEW RULES. (ATTN: ALL)
ygData.msgSnippet: All right in response to the new powers of Empath, the council has felt it necessary to regulate telepathy for the first time.  (And before you get offended

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

All right in response to the new powers of Empath, the council has felt it 
necessary to regulate telepathy for the first time.  (And before you get 
offended Cardhead, no we're not concerned about you abusing these powers. 
It's people with less self control making similar characters and abusing 
these powers that we're worried about.)

1) Telepathy requires a great deal of energon and thus may not be used 
repeatedly or for very long. i.e. you may not paralyze multiple bots at once 
or keep one paralyzed for an indefinite amount of time.

2) Telepathy may not be used very often.  i.e. you may not paralyze a bot 
then move on to another bot without recharging for a time.

3) No direct harm of another bot without expressed consent.  Someone on the 
council must receive a notice from the victim sent before the post where said 
harm is to occur.  Note: This does not apply if you are harming another of 
your characters.

4) Whomever shall use telepathy to paralyze must accept any reasonable 
attempt to escape said telepathy.  Note:  "He was paralyzed but shook it 
off." is not a reasonable attempt.  Put some thought into it.

5) ANY new telepaths with the ability to influence others through their 
thoughts must be approved by the council.  This includes any upgraded by Soul 
Orbs.  There must be a plausible reason for them to have this kind of power 
before they will be approved.  (Soul Orbs are one such reason.)

Thank you for your time.  Any questions, comments, complaints, concerns, 
insults, etc., should be addressed to the council not the group as a whole.

--part1_15e.137f3d15.2aac124f_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<BR>

<BR>
<BR>3) No direct harm of another bot without expressed consent.  Someone on the council must receive a notice from the victim sent before the post where said harm is to occur.  Note: This does not apply if you are harming another of your characters.
<BR>
<BR>4) Whomever shall use telepathy to paralyze must accept any reasonable attempt to escape said telepathy.  Note:  "He was paralyzed but shook it off." is not a reasonable attempt.  Put some thought into it.
<BR>
<BR>5) ANY new telepaths with the ability to influence others through their thoughts must be approved by the council.  This includes any upgraded by Soul Orbs.  There must be a plausible reason for them to have this kind of power before they will be approved.  (Soul Orbs are one such reason.)
<BR>
<BR>Thank you for your time.  Any questions, comments, complaints, concerns, insults, etc., should be addressed to the council not the group as a whole.</FONT></HTML>
